title: Clothespeak
creator_credit: Fiz Oliver, Arbor Films and Margaret Williams
brief_description: Looks at established youth style groups such as Mods, Skinheads, Punks and the New Romantics. Illustrates the importance of style to such groups and aims to eliminate preconceptions about people whose appearance is out of the ordinary. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
